thread.title: UK weather: snow warning as elderly told cold snap could be deadly
thread.title_full: UK weather: snow warning as elderly told cold snap could be deadly

author: Andrew Vaux | Ellie McDonald
title: UK weather: snow warning as elderly told cold snap could be deadly
text:
Arctic air swept across the country yesterday sending temperatures plummeting and hampering operations to clean up areas hit by flooding this week.
The Met Office issued warnings for snow and ice covering vast swathes of the country over the coming days, with falls of up to 30cm forecast on higher ground in Wales and the Pennines.
The UK Health Security Agency (UKHSA) has also issued amber cold weather health alerts for the whole of England until January 8, warning that the cold snap could put the elderly at risk of death.
Allenheads in Northumberland is all white
OWEN HUMPHREYS/PA
Fire crews in Greater Manchester said they attended more than 100 incidents as a result of the flooding, caused by heavy rain through New Year’s Eve and into New Year’s Day.
